PlayerGrounder
MonoBehaviour
public
PlayerGrounder

Manages if the player is touching the ground or not

Information
GroundCheck

Sends a Signal and have a Propertie to indicate if the player is touching the ground or not.

Variables
_grounderCenter
[FoldoutGroup("Paremeters")]
[SerializeField]
private Vector3 _grounderCenter
_grounderRadius
[FoldoutGroup("Paremeters")]
[SerializeField]
private float _grounderRadius
_grounderLayerMask
[FoldoutGroup("Paremeters")]
[SerializeField]
[EnumToggleButtons]
private LayerMask _grounderLayerMask
OnGrounded
public System.Action<bool> OnGrounded

Signal that sends info to the subscribed functions.

IsGrounded
public bool IsGrounded {
get;
private set 
}

Propertie, that returns if the player is grounded or not.

Functions
Update
private void Update()

Unity update function, runs every frame, verifing if the player is touching the ground or not.

GroundCheck
private bool GroundCheck()

Checks if the player is touching the ground or not.  Returns: True if the player is touching the ground.

OnDrawGizmos
protected void OnDrawGizmos()

Unity function, that draws the gizmos on the Editor screen, to better visualize the grounder.
